title: Sundarbans Mangrove Forest
shortDescription: The largest mangrove forest in the world, home to the Royal Bengal Tiger.

shortDescription: The longest natural sea beach in the world, known for its golden sand and stunning sunsets.

shortDescription: A monument dedicated to the martyrs of the Bangladesh Liberation War.

shortDescription: An ancient Buddhist monastery and UNESCO World Heritage Site.

shortDescription: A freshwater swamp forest known as the 'Amazon of Bangladesh'.

title: Madhabkunda Waterfall
